section.title: Apache Forrest - org.apache.forrest.plugin.input.TEI Plugin
section.p: Allows TEI Lite documents to be included within a Forrest content object

section.title: Samples
section.p: This section includes links to a number of samples using this plugin. The plugin is intended to be self documenting through these samples. If you require further help please ask on the user mailing list.

li.a: Complete XDoc sample as a TEI document
li.warning: This document is auotmatically generated by the TEI ouptut plugin. Both the output and input plugins are whiteboard status, i.e. they are not feature complete yet - please help us to improve these plugins. You should be aware that some of the elements look like they are being correctly processed, when in fact they are simply being passed thorough by both the input and output plugins (warnings, notes and fixmes for example). Examine the TEI source document for validation.

section.note: The more samples included here the easier it is for users to understand this plugin. If you can provide additional samples please do so.
